• Public transport
• Attractions, cruises...
• Guide tip of €2 per person per day of travel (total of €10 on this trip)
Optional :
- 1 cabin luggage to be placed in the overhead compartment (10kg and 55x35x25cm max.) = additional charge of €75 in total for the 2 flights
- 1 suitcase of 15kg checked in cargo hold = additional charge of 85€ in total for the 2 flights
RECOMMENDED ACTIVITIES :
• Visit the Blue Mosque, Istanbul's architectural masterpiece
• Buy souvenirs at the Grand Bazaar
• Visit the Saint Sophia Museum
• Cross the Galata Bridge
• Discover the racecourse in Sultanahmet Square
• Visit the Topkapi Palace, a UNESCO World Heritage site built in the 15th century
• Take a walk in Gülhane Park
